subject: Pro Pedals Input
description_text:
Good Morning.

I have just set up my Simsonn pro pedals and when going into a calibration
tool it shows that there is an input when nothing is being pressed.

Please see the attached short video to show what I mean.

How can I overcome this?

Best Regards

Barry

conversations.body_text: Hi，Barry McGuigan，  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download     Please download SIMSONN Manager 2.0.8 and manually update the firmware by selecting the plus.sfu file from the directory. If the issue persists, we can schedule a session in about 9 hours. You just need to install the Todesk remote tool (no registration required) and provide the ID and temporary password. I’ll assist you remotely to resolve the issue.
